00001 #ifndef POISSONGAMMA_HPP
00002 #define POISSONGAMMA_HPP
00003 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00004 // File:        PoissonGamma.cpp
00005 // Description: Compute (by MC integration) the marginal likelihood:
00006 //              a product of Poisson distributions
00007 //              and a prior that is a product of gamma distributions.
00008 //
00009 //              Model:
00010 //
00011 //              d_i = Sum_j p_j * a_ji,  i=1..M,   j=1..N
00012 // 
00013 //              where p_j = n_j / Sum_k a_jk, k=1..M.
00014 // 
00015 //              and n_j is the mean count of source j.
00016 //
00017 //              D_i  is count corresponding to true mean d_i
00018 //              A_ji is effective count corresponding to true mean a_ji
00019 //
00020 // Usage:
00021 //        PoissonGamma p(a, total)
00022 //        x = p.density(n, D)
00023 //
00024 // Created:     21-Jun-2005 Harrison B. Prosper
00025 // Updated:     14-May-2008 Use RandGamma from CLHEP
00026 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 #include <vector>
00028 
00029 typedef std::vector<double>   vdouble;
00030 typedef std::vector<vdouble>  vvdouble;
00031 typedef std::vector<vvdouble> vvvdouble;
00032 
00034 class PoissonGamma
00035 {
00036 public: 
00037 
00039   PoissonGamma(vvdouble& A,
00040                int total=10000);
00041 
00043   ~PoissonGamma();
00044 
00046   double     density(vdouble& n,
00047                      vdouble& D);
00048 
00049 private:
00050 
00051   vvdouble  _A;
00052   int       _N;
00053   int       _M;
00054   int       _total;
00055   vvvdouble _a;
00056 };
00057 
00058 #endif
